pf2e-stances.noCombat: You can enter or be in a stance only in encounter mode

custom.name: Custom Stances
custom.hint: JSON array of objects containing a "feat" and "effect" keys. Ex: [ { "feat": "Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.7JbiaZ8bxODM5mzS", "effect": "Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.zBbmuudbWY8FaOwZ" }, { "feat": "Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.XPPG7nN9pxt0sjMg", "effect": "Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.1bOSJ2LbEC28aI9f" } ]
custom.error: A error occured while parsing custom stances.
